thread.title: Watch: Tiny French bulldog scares not one but two bears away from home
thread.title_full: WTF | Watch: Tiny French bulldog scares not one but two bears away from home - entertainment.ie

author: David O'Shaughnessy
title: Watch: Tiny French bulldog scares not one but two bears away from home
text:
Who needs security with pets like this?
20-pound French bulldog Jewels, clearly not a fan of the story of David and Goliath, was caught on camera scaring away two 7-stone bears that were five times her size after they invaded her garden in Monrovia, California.
Jewels owner David Hernandez had set up the cameras to record the damage the bears were doing to his property but never imagined this is the scene he would see.
The local news team caught up with the fierce Frenchie's owner to talk about the incident and find out how she was rewarded for her efforts.
 MUST WATCH: Two 100-pound bears stroll up to a house in California only to instantly regret their decision when they come face-to-face with all 20 pounds of a feisty French Bulldog.
Posted by WSBT-TV on Sunday, October 4, 2015 Via Independent / YouTube
